app.components.UseConditions.property: {owner} tem a propriedade dos arquivos originais do qual são obtidos os pictogramas publicados nesta Web.
app.components.Welcome.header: {aragones} Centro de Comunicação Aumentativa e Alternativa
app.components.author: Pictograms author:
app.components.licenseP2:
Resources offered on the website (pictograms, images, locutions or
      videos), as well as the materials based o n them, are published under
      {creativeCommonsLicense}, authorizing their use for non-profit
      purposes provided that the source, author and are shared under the same
      license.
app.components.licenseP3: Therefore, the use of these resources within any product or publication for commercial purposes is excluded.
app.components.licenseP4:
For any other use they are strictly prohibited, without written
      authorization of the copyright holders, under the sanctions established by
      law, the total or partial reproduction of these resources by any means or
      procedure, including reprography and computer processing.
app.components.licenseP5:
Any work derived from the resources contained in the {ARASAAC} catalogs
      (pictograms, images, voiceovers or videos), must distribute with the same
      {creativeCommonsLicense}, it must be cited the author and the owner
      thereof (Gobierno de Aragón), their origin (
      {ARASAAC}) and the license under which is distributed (
      {creativeCommonsLicense}).
app.components.licenseP6: In the case of pictograms, the way to attribute authorship is:
app.components.licensep1:
{ARASAAC} is a brand of the Government of Aragon (Spain), registered in
      the Spanish Patent and Trademark Office. The {ARASAAC} pictogram
      collection is registered in the General Registry of Intellectual Property
      (No. Deposit Legal Z 901-2013) as a collective work on behalf of the
      Diputación General de Aragón, who has edited and disseminated it in
      accordance with the provisions of Article 8 of the revised text of the
      Intellectual Property Law, approved by Royal Legislative Decree 1/1996, of
      April 12.
app.components.uploadMaterialView.needAu: At least one author of the material is required
app.components.uploadMaterialView.needFi: At least one material file is required
app.components.uploadMaterialView.needLa: There are languages without material files. Common materials for all languages ​​should be uploaded in step 3
app.containers.AboutView.addressInfo: Estamos em Saragoça (Espanha). A nossa morada é:
app.containers.AboutView.fundedBy: This project is funded by the Department of Culture, Sports and Education of the Government of Aragon (Spain). Specifically ARASAAC belongs to the area of ​​innovation and professional training
app.containers.AboutView.whatArasaacOffe: ARASAAC oferece recursos gráficos e materiais adaptados sob licença Creative Commons (BY - NC - SA) para facilitar a comunicação e a acessibilidade cognitiva a todas as pessoas que, por diferentes razões (autismo, deficiência intelectual, ausência de linguagem, idade, etc.), apresentam sérias dificuldades nestas áreas que impedem a sua inclusão em qualquer domínio da vida quotidiana.
app.containers.ContactView.alertWindowEr: Lamentamos, mas não foi possível receber a sua mensagem. Tente mais tarde ou entre em contacto connosco através das redes sociais
app.containers.ContactView.form.fingersH: Escreva os dedos que vê no pictograma abaixo
app.containers.ContactView.form.name: Nome
app.containers.ContactView.formIntro: Falamos inglês e espanhol. Por favor, contacte-nos de preferência através deste formulário para qualquer pergunta, sugestão ou colaboração. Entraremos em contacto o mais rápido possível.
app.containers.ContactView.sendMessage: Obrigado pela sua mensagem. Entraremos em contacto logo que possível.
app.containers.DevelopersView.grantTypes: Dependendo do tipo de aplicação e necessidades específicas, é necessário implementar um ou outro tipo de autorização. Não hesite em contactar-nos para obter mais informações.
app.containers.DevelopersView.howtoDesc: In order to use the ARASAAC API you need access credentials. We use the Oauth2 authorization protocol that allows us that third-party applications can access both ARASAAC and its users data.
app.containers.DevelopersView.introApi: ARASAAC has an extensive API to serve our resources to third-party applications.
app.containers.DevelopersView.license: ARASAAC creative commons license CC BY-NC-SA
app.containers.DevelopersView.termsOfUse: A API ARASAAC só está disponível para aplicações não comerciais. Certifique-se de que cumpre os termos da licença.
app.containers.MaterialView.materialNotF: Desculpa, o material que você está procurando não existe

app.containers.MaterialsView.showCategor: Mostrar categorias nos resultados da pesquisa
app.containers.PictogramView.pictogramNo: Desculpe, o pictograma que procura não existe
app.containers.PictogramsView.addFolderH: Digite o nome da nova pasta
app.containers.PictogramsView.contentNot: Este conteúdo só está disponível para utilizadores autenticados
app.containers.PictogramsView.newPictogr: Encontrámos {pictogramsCounter} novos ou actualizados nos últimos 30 dias
app.containers.PictogramsView.pictograms: {pictogramsCounter, plural, one {Encontrámos um pictograma} other {Encontrámos {pictogramsCounter} pictogramas}}
app.containers.PrizesView: Desculpe, esta informação está disponível apenas em Espanhol
app.containers.ProfileView.errorPassword: Uppps! Ocorreu um erro ao alterar a palavra-passe
app.containers.TranslateView.crowdinServ: We use Crowdin to translate our web site and our administration panel to different languages. If you want to help with translations, let us hear from you! . We will upgrade your ARASAAC account with translator role and you will also receive an invitation to join Crowdin:
app.containers.WorldView.arasaacInWorld: ARASAAC is present worldwide. In the map below you can see some examples of its usage. Contact us if you wish to share in the map below your experience of using ARASAAC
app.containers.introArasaacPrizes: ARASAAC é um projecto colaborativo, coordenado e financiado pelo Governo de Aragão, que recebeu vários prémios, desde a sua criação, em 2007, graças ao trabalho altruísta de numerosos colaboradores.
app.containers/collaboratorsView.buildAr: ARASAAC is built with the help of many volunteers who prepare educational materials or translate our website and its pictograms into dozens of languages.
app.containers/collaboratorsView.howToCo: Através do site pode partilhar os seus materiais com outros utilizadores. Além disso, também pode ajudar a traduzir o site e pictogramas para a sua língua materna.
app.containersTranslationStatus.pictosTr: Tradução de pictogramas (podem estar traduzidos mas não validados): {pictosValidatedString}%
joyride.aulaAbiertaDesc: The Open Classroom of ARASAAC is a repository of quality content related to Augmentative and Alternative Communication, in which any professional or family can be freely trained in everything related to documents, free software tools and resources that use pictograms of ARASAAC.
joyride.loginMenuDesc: Create a user account or access through your social network to enjoy all the possibilities of the ARASAAC website.
joyride.materialsDesc1: The ARASAAC team and its user community create and adapt materials for communication and cognitive accessibility based on the ARASAAC pictogram collection.
joyride.materialsDesc2: In addition to searching and downloading materials, we encourage you to translate them into other languages ​​or even publish new materials to share.
joyride.pictogramsDesc1: Arasaac has a collection of more than 10,000 pictograms in 20 different languages.
joyride.pictogramsDesc2: Using this menu you can search pictograms to download, modify or save them in favorites lists.
joyride.startNavigation: Click the button to navigate through ARASAAC website.
joyride.userMenuDesc: User-specific actions such as changing personal data.
